subject: Assert stacktraces
msgSnippet: I ve just upgraded from 3.6 to 3.7.  With 3.7, a failed assertions generate a stack trace, and they don t in 3.6.  Is there a way to avoid them, and only have
messageBody:
I've just upgraded from 3.6 to 3.7. With 3.7, a failed assertions generate
a stack trace, and they don't in 3.6. Is there a way to avoid them, and
only have stack traces on Errors instead of Errors and Failures?

Thanks.
David Corbin
